title: Auction Analyst Brett Hatfield
description:
Brett Hatfield is an automotive auction analyst. If you want to know why a car sold for what, he's your guy. He shares a lot of his thoughts at https://www.readthedriven.com. 

This show is also available as a video, full of pictures, videos, and other assets pertaining to the conversation: https://youtu.be/CtOKejPNs7Y

Follow us!
T: @thesmokingtire @zackklapman @brett_hattfield
IG: @thesmokingtire @fakezackklapman 

Check out our merch!
https://teespring.com/stores/thesmokingtire?page=1'

Watch the show! https://youtu.be/fJHKUcnKabI
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
